brief_summary.textblock:
a. VEGFRs may be the biomarker which can predict the effect of bevacizumab in non small cell
      lung cancer

clinical_study.brief_title: VEGFRs Predict Bevacizumab Benefit in Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer

detailed_description.textblock:
1. non small cell lung cancer (non squamous carcinoma)

        2. ECOG 0-1

        3. from 18-75 years old

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  non squamous cell non small cell lung cancer

          -  with measurable disease

          -  ECOG 0-1

        Exclusion Criteria:

        - patients received surgery in recent 4 weeks

study_pop.textblock: advanced non small cell lung cancer patients with brain metastatic disease

intervention.description: the dose and application model of the three intervention are not specified by the sponsor who just observe the efficacy of the combination application of the three in non small cell lung cancer patients with brain metastasis once enrolled.
other_name: Drug:standard chemotherapy recommended by clinical guidlines

facility.name: Cancer Center, Union Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

clinical_study.official_title: VEGFRs Predict Bevacizumab Benefit in Advanced Non Small Cell Lung Cancer
